name: Slime Drive
description:
Play as slime IN A CAR!
Please note:

You will not get the game, If you buy it that is only to help us develop the game.

1. Make your own car! 2. Play as your own Slime YOU MADE!!3. Play on the Story mode YES STORY!4. Play with tons of players!!!!5. What are you waiting for? Click on that "Buy" Button and help us Develop
